content: I don't have access to a real-time information about deals and promotions offered by wing on. however, wing on, like many other retailers, usually offers special deals and promotions on their online platform. these promotions could come in the form of discounts, free shipping, buy-one-get-one-free offers, and other such incentives to encourage customers to make purchases online. customers could check wing on's website and social media pages to get information on current promotional deals offered by the retailer.
